attributes.action: CHRIS BROWN TO BE ABLE TO TOUR AND VISIT THE UK
attributes.additional_details: Chris brown is allowed to tour many other countries. His career is ripping up the charts with number ones and consecutive hits from his massive fan base in this country who cannot see him live as they can't afford to travel to other countries for a concert show.
attributes.background: Chris brown is banned from the UK due to a domestic violence case back in 2009. However due to the massive fan base and successful career over in the UK. He should be allowed to satisfy his fans with touring and visits.
